title: BRIEF-Anevia selected by Blizoo to launch new multiscreen service
text:
BRIEF-Anevia selected by Blizoo to launch new multiscreen service 
Oct 14 Anevia SA : 
* Says to have been selected by Blizoo, a cable company from Bulgaria, for ViaMotion technology to be used for the launch of Live Blizoo, its new OTT multi-screen service Source text: bit.ly/1G5EzGa Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
